title: (x) Kaijunet banners - (similar to) Armchair Modern, Copperplate Gothic {Marc O, Patricia}
content:
I have been hunting down cool fonts similar to this one at 1001fonts.com but I cannot stumble one.   
   
[IMG] [http://www.kaijunet.com/kaijunetbanner.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.kaijunet.com/kaijunetbanner.jpg)[/IMG]   
   
Thats a really cool font or   
[IMG] [http://www.kaijunet.com/knf1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.kaijunet.com/knf1.jpg)[/IMG]   
   
That one is a really cool font.   
   
Thanks for the help guys.
author: kingcaesar

comments.content: In the second sample, "Kaijunet" is Copperplate Gothic

Available for purchase here, among many places:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/copperplate-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/copperplate-gothic/)
First sample reminds me of [armchair modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_armchair.html) but of course it's not a match.

Whatever the font used in the first sample is, it seems 'slightly' inspired by ' [Mata](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=243&dw=1350)', by Greg Samata..

The thread is already closed but if Voodoo is still interested, the exact match for sample 1 is Thundergod (Dan Zadorozny - Iconian Fonts). At this URL there are 10 versions available:   
 [http://www.iconian.com/t.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050901123223/http:/www.iconian.com/t.html)
